G

Game - Class in model
Represents an abstraction of a game.

Initializes the game.
GameException - Exception in model.exceptions
Represents an abstraction of the exceptions that can be thrown in a game.
GameException() - Constructor for exception model.exceptions.GameException
 
GameHost<G extends Game> - Class in model.engine
Hosts the game :
- Can create the game
- Asks for players
- Creates all that's necessary to play the game
- Plays
GameHost(int) - Constructor for class model.engine.GameHost
Creates a host for the game.
